name: MYBL LTD
tag_list: retail-marketing, crm-management, solutions, data-collection, ecommerce, online-booking, website-builder, seo, sem, pos, point-of-sale, software-management
overview:
MYBL LTD is a Retail marketing agency designed for the beauty and fashion industry.

We believe in putting the customer first and we want your first visit to us to be the start of a long relationship. Becoming part of our merchant will enable you to easily find the right products or service your business need at the very best prices – exclusively and just for you, as a member.

Our background

MYBL began in 2012, but has had a market presence since 1999. Since its inception, the company quickly went from strength to strength, building a reputation as a supplier of products such as the Zipit range and has worked with a number of retail stores across the globe.

As representatives of our online goods and services, we feel we can stand behind our products 100%. MYBL LTD currently has a Head Office in London and logistics warehouses both in the US and in Australia. This allows us to offer a worldwide service.
